banner.title: Hydrogen Convergence Business
banner.subTitle: Green energy station using solar power and fuel cells Eco-friendly power generation and eco-friendly charging station

title:
Now that the era of eco-friendly vehicles has arrived
Established as a leader in eco-friendly convergence charging stations
text:
The era of internal combustion engine vehicles, which has been around for over 100 years, is coming to an end, and the era of electric/hydrogen vehicles, or eco-friendly vehicles, is approaching.
In line with the global carbon neutral movement, global automobile companies are accelerating the discontinuation of production of internal combustion engine vehicles and the transition to eco-friendly vehicles.
LTechUVC is keeping pace with the times and establishing itself as a leader in eco-friendly convergence charging stations.

contents.title: Cafe and rest facilities
contents.text: Convenience stores and cafes that can be used while charging

contents.title: Fuel cell
contents.text: Installation of a 300 kW PAFC that produces electricity, water, and hydrogen

contents.title: EV charging station
contents.text: Charging station using electricity generated from fuel cells and solar power

contents.title: Hydrogen car charging station
contents.text: Charging station using hydrogen generated from fuel cell

contents.title: Gas station
contents.text: Expansion of business scope by reflecting existing gas stations
